mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_prepay ( id, device_id_jp, device_id_supp, goods_code, order_id, order_time, order_status, goods_name, sale_price, ctn, path_code, floor, pay_type, prepay_id, create_date, update_date, ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceIdJp}, #{deviceIdSupp}, #{goodsCode}, #{orderId}, #{orderTime}, #{orderStatus}, #{goodsName}, #{salePrice}, #{ctn}, #{pathCode}, #{floor}, #{payType}, #{prepayId}, now(), now() )
